answers.answer: Hi, this could be due to number of causes like neuralgia, diabetes, multiple sclerosis, anemia, low calcium levels, vitamin deficiency, etc.Try vitamin B supplements and get the calcium levels done before reaching out for doctor.

question: I have numbness in my right side or my tongue. I have to the dentist and says he cannot find anthing. It is a throbbing at time.I have it for about one month.
title: numbness in tongue
